overview: Steven is having a run of bad luck: unemployed, marriage on the rocks, and he's obsessed with his stepdaughter Karla, but doesn't know if he should act on it or not. She finally confides in him that her own romantic endeavors, including a faithless boyfriend and an experimental 3way with her BFF (Jade Nile) and some random stranger (Marcus London). Will two lost romantic souls finally find solace by ruining their boring lives by indulging a Forbidden Affair? Steven St. Croix and Karla Kush turn in a couple torrid performances as both speed hell-bent into erotic danger. Also starring Carter Cruise, India Summer and Logan Pierce.
title: Forbidden Affairs 5: My Wife's Daughter
